briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of the BiTE Antibody Blinatumomab in Chinese Adult Subjects With Relapsed/Refractory B-precursor Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia (ALL)
officialTitle: An Open-label, Multicenter, Phase 3 Study to Evaluate Efficacy and Safety of the BiTE Antibody Blinatumomab in Chinese Adult Subjects With Relapsed/Refractory B-precursor Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia (ALL)
summary: This study is being done to evaluate the rate of hematological response (complete remission/complete remission with partial hematological recovery \[CR/CRh\*\]) induced by blinatumomab in Chinese adults with relapsed/refractory B-precursor acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL).

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With a Hematological Response of Complete Remission (CR) or Complete Remission With Partial Hematological Recovery (CRh*) During the First 2 Treatment Cycles With Blinatumomab
